pr_title: CB-9462 [E2E] Enable Private Link creation in CB E2E test

timeline.bodyText: Usually we extends GherkinTest at this level of the project. If you do not judge, this is not worth it, we can leave this at it is.
timeline.author: aszegedi

replies.bodyText: I see. What is the benefit of extending the GherkinTest class? I see that the methods of the GherkinTest class are used solely in RepositoryConfigTests.
replies.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: Ok, you convinced me via chat, I change it. It helps the organization.
replies.author: gergopapi2

timeline.bodyText: Usually we extends GherkinTest at this level of the project. If you do not judge, this is not worth it, we can leave this at it is.
timeline.author: aszegedi

timeline.message:
CB-9462 [E2E] Enable Private Link creation in CB E2E test

This commit enabled to test postgres via private endpoint on azure as well. It can be turned on for AWS and AZURE via environment variable 'integrationtest.privateendpoint.enabled'. For other platforms it is disabled for now.

For AZURE it also needs to be used together with single rg option. If it is a multiple rg deployment, then private endpoints are automatically turned off in int-test.

CB-9462 [E2E] Enable Private Link creation in CB E2E test

This commit enabled to test postgres via private endpoint on azure as well. It can be turned on for AWS and AZURE via environment variable 'integrationtest.privateendpoint.enabled'. For other platforms it is disabled for now.

For AZURE it also needs to be used together with single rg option. If it is a multiple rg deployment, then private endpoints are automatically turned off in int-test.
